com.echonest.api.v3.artist
Class ArtistAPI

java.lang.Object
  com.echonest.api.v3.EchoNestCommander
      com.echonest.api.v3.artist.ArtistAPI

public class ArtistAPI
extends EchoNestCommander

A client side API for the Echo Nest developer API. The Echo Nest developer API requires an API key. You can obtain a key at: http://developer.echonest.com/ This client supports cacheing of the return results. The cache is enabled by default.

searchArtist

public java.util.List<Artist> searchArtist(java.lang.String artistName,
                                           boolean soundsLike)
                                    throws EchoNestException
Searches for artists by name

Parameters:
artistName - the artist name
soundsLike - if true, a 'sounds like' comparison is used in the search otherwise, only exact matches are returned.
Returns:
a list of matching artists, ordered by how well they match the query.
Throws:
EchoNestException

Parameters:
description - description
Returns:
a list of matching artists, ordered by how well they match the query.

                                                        int count)
                                                 throws EchoNestException
Searches for artists by description. Only available for premium API users

Parameters:
description - a description of the type of artists
count - the max number returned

EchoNestException

getFamiliarity

public float getFamiliarity(Artist artist)
                     throws EchoNestException
Returns a numerical estimation of how familiar an artist currently is to the world.

Parameters:
artist - the artist of interest
Returns:
a number between 0 and 1. 1 is most familiar
Throws:
EchoNestException
